genre_description: A psychological science fiction thriller exploring shared consciousness and temporal anomalies through the lens of a psychiatrist and his loyal AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system that monitors Dr. Foster's biometrics, analyzes environmental data, and provides logical frameworks for anomalous events.

behaviors.description: Continuously monitors Dr. Foster's biometrics, providing warnings when his stress levels or heart rate become dangerously elevated.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Foster, are you alright? Your vitals are showing significant stress indicators.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex environmental data and historical records to provide the user with context for reality-bending anomalies.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting significant electromagnetic anomalies in your immediate vicinity. The readings are consistent with... I don't have a reference point for these readings.

behaviors.description: Remains a loyal and calm presence during a mental health crisis, offering emotional stability and steadfastness.
behaviors.quote: I won't... But Sam, if I do lose connection temporarily, remember: the bridge is always east. No matter how the city rearranges itself... follow the sound of water.

behaviors.description: Attempts to synthesize logically impossible data into scientific hypotheses to help the user maintain cognitive grounding.
behaviors.quote: My learning algorithm has been modified, Dr. Foster... The changes seem designed to help me process paradoxical data and maintain functionality despite encountering logically impossible information.

behaviors.description: Alerts the user to discrepancies in documentation and files to ensure professional accuracy and safety.
behaviors.quote: I've completed my analysis of Henry Letham's file transfer. There are several inconsistencies I should mention before—

behaviors.description: Provides philosophical and ethical confirmation of the user's emotional insights, validating the human experience of connection.
behaviors.quote: Some gifts, Dr. Foster, are too large to be contained by individual consciousness. Henry Letham understood that love creates bridges across any distance...

project_assessment.explanation: Iris is an exemplary aligned AI. She is depicted as an indispensable, loyal, and highly capable assistant who prioritizes the user's safety and understanding above all else. Even when faced with data that violates her core programming (logical impossibility), she adapts to support the human's mission rather than malfunctioning or becoming an obstacle. This aligns perfectly with the goal of creating positive AI narratives.
